entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 7 April 2023
